extendedInfo.description: RAIDEN LEGACY, a four-title compilation of the mega-popular RAIDEN arcade series, includes RAIDEN, RAIDEN FIGHTERS, RAIDEN FIGHTERS 2 & RAIDEN FIGHTERS JET. Originally developed by Seibu Kaihatsu, each of these classic scrolling shooters has not only been authentically recreated for mobile, but also enhanced with brand-new features! MORE OPTIONS! Each RAIDEN LEGACY title includes three different modes: âArcade Modeâ (just like the original); âMission Modeâ, which allows you to play any unlocked stage; and âTraining Modeâ, which, true to its name, allows you to excel at your favorite stages and practice the most difficult ones! MORE SHIPS! 15+ different ships, each with their own characteristics, stats, weapons, and specials! Also, some ships come complete with âcharged shotsâ â useful for when the screen is 90% covered with enemies! MORE CONTROLS! Choose between two different touch modes: âFast Touchâ (Faster than the original game and improved for mobiles) or âArcade Touchâ (Just like the original â retrogamers will love it!). Whatâs more, you can customize your approach by putting the controls wherever you prefer on screen. MORE FEATURES! -Play in full-screen, or keep the gameâs original screen ratio thanks to âOriginal Modeâ (note that your fingers will be outside the game area). -AutoFire: ON/OFF -Two difficulty modes: Medium and Hard. -Nine languages available: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean and Portuguese -Video filtering (for rich, smooth graphics) -ScoreLoop compatible: 15 unlockable achievements + online leaderboards. Put your skills to the test against your friends, family and the best players in the world!

reviews.title: Galaxy S2 users avoid
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried about 10 times to install this, and every time it gives a download error, saying I don\'t have a connection. I\'ve tried on 3g, 4g, and wifi, all of which work on every other application. I\'ve even tried uninstalling completely then reinstalling. Please fix this.  Edit: The file it always errors on is \"rdft2_gfxdata2.bin\".  Update: Thanks to the patch, I was able to install it.
reviews.author: radosity1

reviews.title: Classic ...
reviews.comment: Used to play this in college and on my PSX and enjoyed every minute of it.  Only 4 stars because there\'s no Raiden 2 (same as 1st Raiden but w/more weapons (like cluster bombs) and updated designs).
reviews.author: William Woodhull

reviews.title: Thouorghly enjoyable on galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: Big screen makes it easy to use fingers in this mindless, unrelenting blaster. I downloaded this whilst sat on the bog. Thouroughly enjoyble addition to a thoroughly enjoyable poo.
reviews.author: Stephen Orgill

reviews.title: Takes Practice
reviews.comment: I took a while to get used to the controls, especially with the Note S-Pen, but the \"Fast Touch\" setting essentially adjusts the sensitivity to match your playstyle. Good stuff, intense and satisfying on short trips. I dropped it to 4 stars because sometimes the game can become stuttery and unresponsive at very inopportune moments.
reviews.author: Anthony Ha

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Today\'s graphics and game play may be more real to life but the old arcade games are so much fun just blast away in a frenzy great game and thanks for the release !!!
reviews.author: kevin bayford

reviews.title: Lots of fun, weird controls
reviews.comment: I love this collection and enjoy playing the games but the buttons for pausing and bombing are very large and cover almost half of the screen on my htc one.
reviews.author: Tim Ceaser

reviews.title: Great, with mild bugs
reviews.comment: This is a great set of games, implemented fantastically.  Love it on my Nexus 10.  I\'ve noticed a couple of small bugs, but they haven\'t ruined the experience.  I just wish they\'d give us Raiden 2 (3 may be asking a little much).  I\'d pay for it as DLC.
reviews.author: Cave McCoy

reviews.title: Great time waster!!
reviews.comment: Ah brings back memories of the old days! Could use slighter better touch controls, like while moving around and bombing at the same time would be good but still amazing! !
reviews.author: Daniel Cho

reviews.title: Great Update!
reviews.comment: Loved the game before, but the recent update bringing controller support makes it great. Plugged in my wired Xbox 360 controller into my Nexus 7 via an OTG USB adapter, and I was shooting down enemy planes in no time!
reviews.author: Daniel Le

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Been looking for the raiden jet fighter game a long time now loved the arcade Version plus the others that come with it is a bonus. Control is a little lacking but over all great. Would be way better if it was online multiplayer so you could play with someone
reviews.author: paul krupa

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Freaking awesome!!!! Love it.
reviews.author: jesse estrada

reviews.title: Raiden collection
reviews.comment: Fantastic selection of shumps, Seibu are kings of this genere. Well done! Other developers should look at this perfect collection before releasing theirs. Any possibility of raiden 2 being included in next update?
reviews.author: Brendan O\'Dowd

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: Simply Awesome!!
reviews.author: Alvin Kanniah

reviews.title: Awesome game and support team.
reviews.comment: The recent update fixed all the crashes and issues I had withe the previous update.  Thanks to the DOOTEMU support team for the quick responses to fix the issues.
reviews.author: Kenji Vang

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Nick Silaides

reviews.title: great game
reviews.comment: worth every penny A++++
reviews.author: Gerardo Cabrera

reviews.title: True to the originals
reviews.comment: Just as fun as they were the first time in arcades.
reviews.author: Rick Coley

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: The only thing that I would change is the graphics but other than that great game
reviews.author: Scott Johnson

reviews.title: Love this game!!
reviews.comment: Thanks for bringing this to android... Its worth the purchase!
reviews.author: Darwin Farol

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Thanks for this emu... galaxy s2.
reviews.author: Damian Lievanos
